BTC deposits, MUSD minting, and collateral management using real MUSD contracts Architecture: - Integrates with official Mezo MUSD contracts on Matsnet/Mainnet - Uses Chainlink price feeds for BTC/USD pricing - Implements Trove management (CDP) for collateralized lending - Provides gas-optimized hint system for efficient operations Features: - BTC collateral deposit and MUSD minting via Trove system - Real-time collateral ratio monitoring - Position health checks and liquidation protection - Refinancing support for interest rate optimization - Emergency withdrawal and pause mechanisms Security: - ReentrancyGuard on all state-changing functions - Pausable for emergency situations - Collateral ratio validation against MCR/CCR - Oracle price feed staleness protection - Permission-based administrative functions","errors":{"AddressEmptyCode(address)":[{"details":"There's no code at `target` (it is not a params.btcAmount: Amount of BTC to add as collateral

burnAndWithdraw(uint256).details: Repays debt and withdraws collateral from Mezo Trove

depositAndMint(uint256).details: Opens a new Trove or adjusts existing one in MUSD protocolUses real Mezo contracts for collateralization and minting

params.btcAmount: Amount of BTC to deposit (8 decimals for WBTC)

returns.minRatio: Minimum collateral ratio in basis points

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

refinanceTrove().details: Only beneficial if global rate is lower than Trove's current rate

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.newMaxFee: New max fee in basis points (max 1000 = 10%)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

BORROWER_OPERATIONS().notice: Mezo BorrowerOperations contract for Trove management

HINT_HELPERS().notice: Mezo HintHelpers contract for gas optimization

PRICE_FEED().notice: Mezo PriceFeed contract for BTC/USD prices

TROVE_MANAGER().notice: Mezo TroveManager contract for system state

WBTC_TOKEN().notice: WBTC token (wrapped Bitcoin) - for mainnet integration

addCollateral(uint256).notice: Adds more BTC collateral without minting additional MUSD

burnAndWithdraw(uint256).notice: Burns MUSD and withdraws BTC collateral

constructor.notice: Constructor - Initialize with Mezo contract addresses

depositAndMint(uint256).notice: Deposits BTC to Mezo and mints MUSD against the collateral

emergencyWithdraw(address,uint256).notice: Emergency withdrawal of stuck tokens (owner only)

getBorrowRate().notice: Gets the borrowing rate for MUSD from Mezo

getBtcBalance(address).notice: Gets the user's BTC collateral balance from Mezo

getBtcPrice().notice: Gets the current BTC/USD price from Mezo oracle

getCollateralRatio(address).notice: Gets the user's collateral ratio from Mezo

getMinCollateralRatio().notice: Gets the minimum collateral ratio required by Mezo

getMusdDebt(address).notice: Gets the user's MUSD debt balance from Mezo

isPositionHealthy(address).notice: Checks if the user's position is healthy

mintMore(uint256).notice: Mints additional MUSD against existing collateral

refinanceTrove().notice: Refinances Trove to current global interest rate

repayDebt(uint256).notice: Repays MUSD debt without withdrawing collateral

totalBtcDeposited().notice: Total BTC deposited through this contract

totalMusdMinted().notice: Total MUSD minted through this contract

userBtcCollateral(address).notice: User BTC collateral balances (tracked locally for efficiency)

userMusdDebt(address).notice: User MUSD debt balances (tracked locally for efficiency)
